title: Silver Team Looking for Adc
body: We are a friendly Team that's looking for an ADC to fill our ranks.  We play on Tuesday evenings. Add me in game or comment on this post to further info.

replies.body: Im a Silver 4 adc, Mains jinx, lucian and vayne. Add if intrested
I'm an OK ADC i think i sent you a friend request though and currently silver 2
I'm mid bronze, is that too low? I have decent mechanics, it's just my macro that falls flat, but with a team I would do better

Its not the rank that matters, i understand the pain that is ELO and how much effort it takes to get out. Just add me in game and we can play some games together. If we get along well and you do well ill offer you the spot. :D:D
hey man, I don't main adc but I'm pretty good at vayne and luc, I could play if you just needed an extra player im silver 3. was silver 2.
